articles.title: As Auschwitz exhibit opens in Kansas City, memories haunt this Holocaust survivor
articles.description: “Not only do I feel it, I see it,” says Johnson County woman, now 93, who lived to tell about the Holocaust.
articles.content:
She is one of the last survivors of Auschwitz in the Kansas City area.

articles.title: U.S. To Expand Passport Gender Markers For Nonbinary, Intersex Americans
articles.description: For the first time, the State Department will allow people to obtain passports and IDs using a gender neutral "X" marker instead of "M" or "F."
